content: I can see how hopeless was situation for you, and understand how terrible it is, i am really sorry you had to carry this alone, after finding out situation you were in, on gentoo discord.. i am sorry, it was really tough for you, too much... To hold, i thought you were alive yet, i wanted to recommend you supportive forums, and listen to you, understand.. i am sorry you had to go trought all of it.. good bye, rest in peace.
